definition:
Let $R$ be a ring with multiplicative identity. Let $M$ be a () module
over $R$. We may assume there exists an exact sequence $P_*$:

$$\dots\dots\rightarrow P_2\rightarrow P_1\rightarrow P_0$$

with the $P_n$ projective and the cokernel of the last map $M$. Given
$M$, this sequence is unique up to chain homotopy. Hence we may make the
following definitions.

For a () $R$- module $A$ we may define

$$Ext_R^n(M,A)=H^n(P_*; A)$$

For a (left) $R$- module $A$ we may define

$$Tor_R^n(M,A)=H_n(P_*; A)$$
